documentation.text: The VotingAppFactory contract is designed to produce individual VotingApp contracts*
The VotingAppFactory contract is designed to produce individual VotingApp contracts*

params._DAO: is the address of the Cortex DAO that will own the created VotingApp*

genesis(address).notice: genesis is called to create a new VotingApp contract

userdoc.notice: The VotingAppFactory contract is designed to produce individual VotingApp contracts*
